meanings.definition: Activities pursued outside of regular curriculum.
meanings.sent1: Many students enjoy participating in extracurriculars like sports and clubs.
meanings.sent2: After school, I always join extracurriculars to have fun and learn new things.
meanings.sent3: The extracurriculars at school make me feel like a busy bee buzzing around.
meanings.sent4: To me, extracurriculars are like colorful puzzle pieces that complete my day.
meanings.sent5: The variety of extracurriculars available is as vast as the ocean, offering something for everyone.

meanings.sent1: Students can choose from a range of extracurriculars to enhance their skills.
meanings.sent2: My favorite part of school is participating in different extracurriculars.
meanings.sent3: Trying out new extracurriculars feels like exploring uncharted territory.
meanings.sent4: Extracurriculars are like sprinkles on the cupcake of my academic life.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of extracurriculars shine brightly, illuminating the path to success.
